form_validators module¶

form_validators.login_details_correct(form, field)¶

Ensure that the login details entered by the user are correct

Parameters

  • form – the form the user enters details on

  • field – the field to check for valid data in

form_validators.unique_email(form, field)¶

Ensure that the email entered by the user on the form is unique

Parameters

  • form – the form the user enters details on

  • field – the field to check for valid data in

form_validators.unique_username(form, field)¶

Ensure that the username is unique

Parameters

  • form – the form the user enters details on

  • field – the field to check for valid data in

form_validators.valid_password(form, field)¶
form_validators.valid_updated_email(form, field)¶
form_validators.valid_updated_username(form, field)¶
